title: French minister moves to block US envoy Kushner from government access
summary_full: The minister says Charles Kushner, father of Trump's son-in-law Jared, failed to explain comments about violence in France.
summary_public: The minister says Charles Kushner, father of Trump's son-in-law Jared, failed to explain comments about violence in France.

FR.label: positive
FR.evidence: French minister moves to block US envoy Kushner from government access
